name: Absolutely Barbaric (Beta)
description:
Absolutely Barbaric

An ARPG/Hack 'n Slash where you have to make as much points as possible by killing creatures and collecting coins and gems which can be found in vases and under the grass!

Beware of the evil Minotaur that roams through these realms!

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys / W-A-S-D

Attack: Space / left mouse button

Roll (evade): Ctrl left / right mouse button

This is a first Beta build! Many parts will be subject to change! More features will be added subsequently.

Feedback and/or bug reports are highly appreciated! 😉🙏

 Have fun!
